mosinstall.name: Downloads
mosinstall.author: Josh Prakash
mosinstall.description: This module shows a list of defined Docman Categories. Developed by Josh Prakash. (C) 2007 www.Joshprakash.com

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of items to display (default 7)
